pageTitle: Patent US5595389 - Method and apparatus for producing "personalized" video games using CD discs - Google Patents
textBeforeTable: Patent Citations 50 CD Reader 48 Cartridge 46 Digital Memory 44 Other CD Discs (Pressed CD's) 42 Personalized CD Disc (Writable-CD) 40 Player 34 Laser-Written Segment 32 Pressed Area 30 Hybrid Disc 26 Sound Source 24 Blue Screen Matt Background 22 Customer 20 Image Capturing Means 18 CD Disc Writer 16 Printer 15 Keyboard 14 Display Screen 13 CD Disc Reader 12 Processor 10 System PARTS LIST While there has been shown what are considered to be the preferred embodiments of the invention, it will be manifest that many changes and modifications may be made therein without departing from the essential spirit of the invention. It is intended, therefore, in the annexed claims, to cover all such changes and modifications as may fall within the true scope of the invention. The hybrid disc 30 (illustrated in FIG. 3) is manufactured by RICOH corporation. The format for writing and reading such a disc is set out in the "Orange Book" which is an industry standard established by Sony and Philips. In FIG. 6 the flow starts with data that represents both the personalized and authored portions of the game. The representation may have the data intermixed at the correct spots or all of one type of data may be separate from the other.
